description: Play as both Gabriel Knight and Grace Nakimura as you learn more about what is hidden in the hills of France.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 7 Compatible DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

reviews.review_text: Have Windows 8 or Windows 10? This game won't run on your computer without crashing every 5 minutes.
